sql.if: and (a.SATT_ID like '%'||#{search}||'%' or a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID like '%'||#{search}||'%' or a.STUDENT_ID like '%'||#{search}||'%' or a.SATT_YN like '%'||#{search}||'%' or c.STUDENT_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or c.STUDENT_HP like '%'||#{search}||'%' or e.SCHOOL_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or d.LESSON_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%')

mapper.select:
select a.SATT_ID as sattId, a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID as lessonAssignmentId, a.STUDENT_ID as studentId, a.SATT_TIME as sattTime, a.SATT_YN as sattYN, d.LESSON_NAME as lessonName, c.STUDENT_NAME as studentName, c.STUDENT_HP as phone, e.SCHOOL_NAME as schoolName from SUBJECTATTENDANCE a, LESSONASSIGNMENT b, STUDENT c, LESSON d, SCHOOL e
where a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = b.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID and (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.SATT_TIME),'YY/MM/DD')) = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL) and a.STUDENT_ID = c.STUDENT_ID and b.LESSON_ID = d.LESSON_ID and c.SCHOOL_NO = e.SCHOOL_ID and b.MNG_ID = #{mngId}

SELECT SATT_ID, LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID, STUDENT_ID, SATT_TIME, SATT_YN
FROM SUBJECTATTENDANCE
WHERE LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = #{lessonAssignmentId}
and (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SATT_TIME),'YY/MM/DD')) = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL) order by SATT_ID desc
mapper.insert:
insert into SUBJECTATTENDANCE(SATT_ID,LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID,STUDENT_ID,SATT_TIME,SATT_YN) select SUBJECTATTENDANCE_SEQ.nextval, A.* from(
select #{item.lessonAssignmentId}, #{item.studentId}, sysdate, 'N' from dual ) A
mapper.select:
SELECT a.SATT_ID as sattId, a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID as lessonAssignmentId, a.STUDENT_ID as studentId, a.SATT_TIME as sattTime, a.SATT_YN as sattYN, c.STUDENT_NAME as studentName, c.STUDENT_HP as phone, d.SCHOOL_NAME as schoolName, f.LESSON_NAME as lessonName
FROM SUBJECTATTENDANCE A, LESSONASSIGNMENT B, STUDENT C, SCHOOL D, LESSON F
WHERE a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = b.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID and a.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = #{lessonAssignmentId} and b.MNG_ID = #{mngId} and a.STUDENT_ID = c.STUDENT_ID and c.SCHOOL_NO = d.SCHOOL_ID and b.LESSON_ID = f.LESSON_ID and (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SATT_TIME),'YY/MM/DD')) = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL) order by SATT_ID desc
